ISSUE.TITLE: bug: Can't set other Nginx built-in parameters when config chash balancer
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Can not set other Nginx built-in parameters when config chash balancer ### Environment * apisix version (cmd: `0.8`): * OS: Centos 7.4 it should support other built-in parameters like `uri,hostname`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: doc: fix 404 link when link to install-dependencies
